neeta works
Hello, world.

My name is Neeta Patel. I am a graphic designer and artist.

I am currently the 2016 – 17 Graphic Design Fellow at the Frank Lloyd Wright Foundation at Taliesin West, located in Scottsdale, Arizona. Prior to this desert adventure, I received my undergraduate degree in visual arts and computer science from Princeton University. To see what I’ve been up to most recently, visit my process blog.
